name: Momenta Ball
description:
Momenta Ball will push your patience and test your skills.

Gain momentum to get through courses. Find secrets and alternate paths. Jump over and under obstacles to discover what's next.

Puzzle Platforming that will challenge your patience and wits. How far can you make it? With 15 levels, all with varying difficulty and scenery. With unique simplistic ball movement controls that can be easy to pick up but difficult to master. Multiple surface types such as Ice, Bouncy, Max Friction and more. Different atmospheres with max gravity, some with zero gravity, also areas with no jumping where momentum really comes into play.

Are you up for the challenge?

With a unique and completely original soundtrack composed by http://www.hammerheadashbyproductions.com/ that will keep you wanting to hear more.

Developed by: Jason Stahl
